modName: Liliths Devastator - Custom waraxe and battleaxe
summary: This mod adds 2  high resolution new axes into the game that could be considered a remake of the liliths obliterator.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]Description:[/b][/size]

This mod adds 2 new axes into the game that could be considered a remake of the liliths obliterator. The axes are balanced for (vanilla) endgame thus having slightly higher stats than daedric equipment. The weapons can be crafted at any forge (daedric smithing required) and they can also be upgraded to their awakened state which adds +1 to their base damage and alters their appearance (see pics).



[size=4][b]Weapons:[/b]
[/size]
Lilith's Devastator: the initial design, 1-handed axe

Lilith's Devastator (2h): 2-handed version of the axe


Crafting requirements(1hs): Daedric smithing, 3 void salts, 6 ebony ingots, 4 daedra hearts

Crafting requirements(2hs): Daedric smithing, 5 void salts, 8 ebony ingots, 5 daedra hearts




1: type[b] [size=4]help devastator[/size][/b] into the console

2: it gives you the IDs.

3. type "player.additem *id* *amount* " without the * and "

example: [b][size=4]player.additem 0a000b52 1[/size][/b]
[b]
[size=4]Installation:[/size]
[/b]

1. Dump the bsa-file and the esp-file inside the data folder into the skyrim's data folder. / or use the mod manager. it should work.

2. check the .esp file and you're ready to go

[b][size=4]Uninstallation:[/size]
[/b]

Just remove the files you added.
author: wiikki
